item.title: Version 0.2.21
item.description: Whisper Smart v0.2.21 - Fixed Sparkle update validation by shipping SUPublicEDKey in the app bundle. - Added signed Sparkle appcast enclosure support (sparkle:edSignature). - Hardened release workflow so appcast publishing now requires a valid Sparkle signature.

item.title: Version 0.2.20
item.description: Whisper Smart v0.2.20 - Fixed provider-switch crash path by deferring active-session swaps safely. - Removed automatic Parakeet provisioning on install/switch; setup is now explicit from Provider tab. - Added first-run onboarding with mode selection, permission readiness, and guided setup handoff. - Upgraded Settings UX and refreshed visual baselines for the new product flow.

item.title: Version 0.2.19
item.description: Whisper Smart v0.2.19 - Fixed Sparkle auto-update flow so background checks are not forced on every launch. - Added automated appcast generation/publish in release pipeline. - Corrected in-app feed URL and maintained compatibility for older clients.

item.title: Version 0.2.18
item.description: Whisper Smart v0.2.18 - Completed all 5 roadmap phases across UX stability, performance telemetry, cloud hardening, dictation quality, and release operations. - Stabilized visual regression checks across CI render environments. - Added configurable cloud endpoint profiles with validation and diagnostics. - Hardened release pipeline with checklist gate, signing/notarization path, DMG checksum verification, and rollback notes.

item.title: Version 0.2.6
item.description: v0.2.6 - Unsupported-source card UX fix New in this release: - Unsupported Canary source now shows a single warning-only state - Removed conflicting Retry/Try mirror + red failed text for unsupported sources - Added one-click "Use compatible source" action back to runnable ONNX source - Preserved normal runnable download/retry behavior

item.title: Version 0.2.5
item.description: v0.2.5 - Download reliability + compatibility gating fixes New in this release: - Fixed model downloads getting stuck at 100% by enforcing deterministic completion states - Added timeout-bounded finalize/preflight steps to avoid indefinite waits - Explicitly blocked unsupported non-ONNX Canary safetensors in ONNX STT runtime path with clear guidance - Added smoke coverage for completion transitions and unsupported-source handling

item.title: Version 0.2.4
item.description: v0.2.4 - Canary-Qwen STT option + tokenizer validation fix New in this release: - Removed Qwen TTS preview path from Provider settings - Added one-click STT source option for NVIDIA Canary-Qwen-2.5B (experimental) - Fixed tokenizer false-fail for valid Parakeet vocab sizes - Kept one-click UX and setup messaging improvements

item.title: Version 0.2.3
item.description: v0.2.3 - Parakeet download reliability and calmer setup UX New in this release: - Fixed Parakeet TDT v3 source URLs to avoid HTTP 404 - Added auto fallback to mirror source on 404 and manual "Try mirror" action - Reduced red/error overuse in setup UI; red now reserved for true failures - One-click setup flows remain unchanged and verified

item.title: Version 0.2.2
item.description: v0.2.2 - Parakeet source alignment + Qwen TTS preview option New in this release: - Balanced Parakeet mapping aligned to TDT v3 ONNX source path - Removed stale recommended messaging in provider UX - Added one-click Qwen3-TTS option in Text-to-Speech (Preview) - Kept STT flow stable with passing smoke/typecheck gates

item.title: Version 0.2.1
item.description: v0.2.1 - Parakeet hardening + release safety polish New in this release: - Added explicit Parakeet labeling as experimental and not recommended across UI/provider/source labels - Hardened QA scripts and smoke coverage to prevent regressions in local setup flows - Added swift_test_check.sh to safely handle repos without a SwiftPM test target - Improved prerequisite guidance and one-click recovery messaging for managed runtimes

item.title: Version 0.2.0
item.description: v0.2.0 - Smart Whisper model-selection overhaul New in this release: - Added Smart presets (Light/Balanced/Best/Cloud) with clearer setup flows - Fixed provider fallback resolution so unavailable Parakeet degrades correctly - Added Whisper tiny_en tier for lightweight local use - Stabilized keyboard UI test across simulator keyboard-control variance
